org.xjava.gsonrpc

Class GsonRPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xjava.gsonrpc.GsonRPC

  • public class GsonRPC
extends java.lang.Object
    A Gson based Java library for creating and/or processing JSON-RPC 2.0 requests following the specification at http://jsonrpc.org/specification
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adam Lowman

    • Constructor Detail

      • GsonRPC

        public GsonRPC()
        Constructs an instance of GsonRPC without a supplied GsonBuilder.

      • GsonRPC

        public GsonRPC(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder gsonBuilder)
        Constructs an instance of GsonRPC using a supplied GsonBuilder. This allows you to register any custom Gson serializers/deserializers you will need (all other GsonBuilder options may be overwritten).

        To initialize GsonRPC with a GsonBuilder use the following code:

        
 GsonBuilder gsonBuilder = new GsonBuilder();
 gsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(CustomType.class, new CustomTypeSerializer()); //OPTIONAL
 gsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(CustomType.class, new CustomTypeDeserializer()); //OPTIONAL
 GsonRPC gsonRPC = new GsonRPC(gsonBuilder);

        NOTE: Be sure to use gsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(type, typeAdapter) to register any custom serializers/deserializers you will need before passing gsonBuilder to GsonRPC.

        Parameters:
        gsonBuilder - The GsonBuilder
